aboutme.content-div:
I am a passionate frontend developer from Leverkusen, Germany, turning designers' and companies' ideas into functional, appealing digital products. I enjoy working in creative teams that support each other and find new solutions.
If you think I would be a good fit for your team and projects, feel free to reach out – I’m excited to connect!

references.references-description-one: I love working in a team but also independently.
references.references-description-two: Here’s what my colleagues say about working with me.
references.reference-one-content: Marco is an extremely reliable colleague you can always count on. He works well in a team, supports others with his positive attitude, and contributes to success through his creative problem-solving skills.
references.reference-two-content: Marco was not only highly reliable but also contributed to a pleasant team atmosphere with his positive and motivating nature. His constructive and creative suggestions continuously pushed the project forward.
references.reference-three-content: Working with Marco is very enjoyable and educational. His ability to analyze, tackle, and solve problems has significantly contributed to our project's progress. His helpfulness ensures that every obstacle finds a solution!
